companies.title: Software Engineer Intern
tasks: Assisted in designing web applications to process, analyze, and visualize data, including supporting the development of new features for enhanced data representation.
Collaborated with senior developers across various work-streams to maintain code quality and best practices.
Contributed to a mentorship program by learning from and providing feedback to junior and entry-level engineers.
Coordinated with back-end developers, front-end developers, and quality assurance testers to ensure smooth project execution.
Maximized applications efficiency, data quality, scope, operability, and flexibility.
Aimed to improve applications' efficiency, data quality, and flexibility while building responsive websites using HTML5, JavaScript, ReactJS, and CSS.

companies.title: Software Engineer Intern
tasks: Participated in developing full-stack applications using contemporary technologies and frameworks.
Assisted in debugging applications, web pages, and product features to enhance performance and functionality.
Supported the identification and resolution of web development issues reported by clients.
Assisted in deploying applications to cloud-based environments and managing both relational and document databases.
Contributed to the development and maintenance of web-based software under the guidance of experienced developers.

companies.title: Technical Support Intern
tasks: Assisted in the installation of equipment on-site.
Supported the troubleshooting and repair of defective or broken equipment.
Provided basic instructions to customers on how to use their equipment effectively.
